        The Refrigerator method is a constructor of Refrigerator class.
        Parameters:
        maker - is the company maker name.
        model - is the Refrigerator model.
        price - is the value of Refrigerator price in US dollar.
        warranty - is the value of the warranty.
        cap - is the value of Refrigerator capacity.
        type - is the value of the Refrigerator type.
        sys - is the Refrigerator cooling system.
